ygData.subject: Re: Slaughter Dies...Twice.
ygData.msgSnippet: Menasor smiled at the satisfying feeling and noise made by his strength. He stood to his full height, towring over the rest of the Decepticons, then looked

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Menasor smiled at the satisfying feeling and noise made by his strength.
He stood to his full height, towring over the rest of the Decepticons,
then looked down.

Megatron moved towards the broken cadavre and nealt before it, he looked
it over to make sure it was dead. One of his finger's tips opened, and a
strange vile sucked up a small bit of the green goo, before it closed up
again. He stood, and looked up to Menasore. "Good job Menasor." Megatron
turned around. "Let this be a lesson to all who invade our territory,
you die." Megatron threatened hoisting his fist in the air. "Menasor
dissengage." Megatron shouted. 

Menasor then fell apart. Before the five pieces hit the ground however
they all shifted and changed, transforming into their robotic modes, all
five landing with grace, in a small circle.

Megatron looked on, "Now proceed with our mission." he shouted,
reffering to the orders he gave earlier. 

Motormaster nodded, "All right, come on boys." he shouted, as he leapt
to the air, followed by Wildrider and Speedbreaker, as they soared
towards the Azores islands.

Megatron looked to Astrotrain, Stratus and the Terrorcons to follow.
Sinnertwin knew his role, and leapt into the air after his comerades.
